sales.name: Faryl Robin
sales.description: In 2002, Faryl Robin Morse set out to create the perfect heel, and her line — a favorite of stars, including Leighton Meester — has since grown to include footwear for every occasion life could throw your way. This fresh collection of bold, edgy styles is for the girl who likes her shoes to be truly unique: Think metallic flats, hidden-wedge sandals, colorblocked sandals, and luxe suede numbers.

sales.name: Lilac Maternity
sales.description: Sisters Becca Taylor and Kristy Olsen want you to feel great about your bump — that's why they created Lilac Maternity, a chic line that’s as much about comfort as it is about style. Today’s selection includes everything you need to look (and feel) amazing during your pregnancy, including wrap tops, dresses, and more.

sales.name: Valentino Prêt-à-Porter
sales.description: Few fashion houses celebrate femininity more breathtakingly than the master designers at Valentino, and this classy collection truly does the label proud. Think silk pleated skirts; sequined dresses and pants; embroidered brocade jackets; ruffled overcoats; and plenty more head-turning examples of why we can't get enough of Valentino here at Gilt.

sales.name: Spring is here: Provençal Rosé for under $10/bottle
Voluspa Candles & Diffusers
sales.description: Voluspa spares no expense with its handcrafted candles, from the composition of their wax to their packaging in dupioni silk bags. Sample the company’s scents, which range from the earthy (White Copalli Amber) to the zingy (Italian Tangelo). Also check out the diffusers, which will make your scent renovation complete.

sales.name: Annette Tatum: Decorate the Nursery
sales.description: Annette Tatum's modern designs will bring some sweet style to your little one's nursery. These bedding sets, sleep sacs, and Moses baskets fit perfectly with a modern-chic decor, and we love that the brand encourages layering your home with style, just like you do with your clothes.

sales.name: GO SMiLE
sales.description: We have a pretty serious morning latte habit, but you'd never know it, thanks to Go Smile. It's the Gilt beauty team's secret to sparkling white teeth (and it only takes four minutes a day). We're offering the popular whitening system in this sale, plus toothpastes and touch-up kits that will keep your smile looking perfect.

sales.name: RuffleButts and RuggedButts Apparel
sales.description: RuffleButts' ruffle-embellished bottoms appear on leggings, swimsuits, and bloomers, and they're pretty much the cutest things we've ever seen! The line also includes boys' clothes that feature darling animal prints instead of ruffles. These adorable duds are a huge hit with celebs like Jessica Simpson, Bethenny Frankel, and Jessica Alba — you won't be able to resist our aww-inspiring collection.

sales.name: Fissler: Cookware & Accessories
sales.description: Every piece in this selection of kitchenware expertly blends function and style. Choose from pots and pans, cutlery, woks, mills, bowls ... even a spaghetti lifter. Each one will actually make food prep fun.

sales.name: Molly Sims' Top Baby Picks
sales.description: Molly Sims is definitely one stylish celebrity mama! So as part of our Baby Shower Week, we asked her to choose her favorite items for little ones (think swaddles and baby clothes). She also gave us the scoop on how she's preparing for motherhood — read about it here!

sales.name: Torn Ranch Snacks & Gifts
sales.description: Once a retail store in Marin County, California, Torn Ranch has become one of the country’s finest purveyors of handcrafted chocolates, baked goods, jumbo nuts and dried fruits. Nestled between San Francisco and Napa Valley, they're famous for their hand-assembled baskets, trays and towers of specialty foods.

sales.name: Molly Sims' Top Baby Picks
sales.description: Molly Sims is definitely one stylish celebrity mama! So as part of our Baby Shower Week, we asked her to choose her favorite items for little ones (think swaddles and baby clothes). She also gave us the scoop on how she's preparing for motherhood — read about it here!

sales.name: Luxury Bedding Feat. Errebicasa & Sferra
sales.description: Sublime in look and feel, these Italian linens take bedding to new levels of luxe. The shams and duvet covers feature detailed embroideries and delicate hemstitching, while the solid sateen sheet sets come in timeless, subtle shades like silver, ivory, and sand. Silky throws and sophisticated pillows complete the look.

sales.name: Leather & Wrap Bracelets by Presh & More
sales.description: Leather and wrap bracelets are all the rage this season, and if you're anything like our jewelry team, you love to pile them on. Pick your favorites from this of-the-moment array: Think leather tinted with metallics and other unexpected hues, and styles adorned with zippers and chains, and more.

sales.name: Valentino Sunglasses
sales.description: As any ardent Gilt-o-phile knows, we've carried Valentino's gorgeous gowns and chic separates before, but we've never carried the label's glamorous sunglasses — until now! We've hand-selected the shades we know you're going to love, from paparazzi-ready oversized frames to options with stud detailing and metal trim.

sales.name: Twelfth Street by Cynthia Vincent
sales.description: Show your softer side this spring with our silky selection from L.A. designer Cynthia Vincent. Let the richly colored camisoles and blouses hang loose for a sweet, feminine look, and turn to pretty touches like lace and ruching for a touch of romance. Rounding out this mix are velvet and silk dresses so, so soft to the touch you seriously won't want to take them off.

sales.name: Fine Jewelry Personal Shopping
sales.description:
Our Fine Jewelry Personal Shopping team is now available to offer one-on-one assistance in finding everything from classic investment pieces to one-of-a-kind designs not currently available on Gilt.com. To give you some idea of the kinds of gorgeous gems to which we have access, we’ve rounded up an amazing array of finds for your perusing pleasure, including multi-gem earrings, museum-worthy necklaces, and diamonds galore.

Looking for something you don’t see here? Contact our Personal Jewelry Shopping team at jewelryrequests@gilt.com or (855) 758-3765.

sales.name: Lonely Planet Travel Books
sales.description: Full of insider tips and off-the-beaten-path suggestions, this guidebook series will make you feel like you’re traveling with the ultimate sherpa. Take your pick of countries on five continents, or make the whole world come to you with inspiring titles like The World’s Best Street Food.

sales.name: Voluspa Candles & Diffusers
sales.description: Voluspa spares no expense with its handcrafted candles, from the composition of their wax to their packaging in dupioni-silk bags. Sample the company’s scents, which range from the earthy (White Copalli Amber) to the zingy (Italian Tangelo). Also check out the diffusers, which will make your scent renovation complete.

sales.name: Spring is here! Fiddlehead Ferns & Wild Ramps
Think Spring: Floral-Print Accents
sales.description: Spring is in the air; recreate its buzzing freshness indoors by deploying an artful mix of floral accent pieces. This sale features Missoni pendants, which will truly light up a space, and framed botanical prints that impart a fresh take on Old World elegance in a living room or a foyer. Also shop for hand-painted furniture, sumptuous bedding, and modern bud vases.

sales.name: Valentino Prêt-à-Porter
sales.description: Few fashion houses celebrate femininity more breathtakingly than the master designers at Valentino, and this classy collection truly does the label proud. Think silk pleated skirts; sequined dresses and pants, embroidered brocade jackets; ruffled overcoats — and plenty more head-turning examples of why we can't get enough of Valentino here at Gilt.

sales.name: White + Warren, Eileen Fisher & More
sales.description: Here at Gilt, we firmly believe that elegant basics are the foundation for a versatile wardrobe. Which is why we've put together this lot of pieces that prove that simple need not mean boring. Case in point: these embellished cashmere cardigans, soft wool sweaters, cool leather jackets, and effortless wrap and sweater dresses.

sales.name: Restock Your Closet
sales.description: Whether you’re looking to completely rebuild your wardrobe or just fill a few important gaps in your repertoire, we’ve got you covered in this sale. Stock up on stylish picks from a host of great brands, and take on the spring in top form.

sales.name: Ports 1961
sales.description: On the lookout for a brand that can do double duty? Say hello to Ports 1961, the brand known for looks that transition seamlessly from office-appropriate to statement-making nighttime style. See for yourself: The mix here includes elegant shells, sophisticated wrap dresses, and classic trousers right alongside edgier pieces like jackets with corset details and sleek leather shifts.

sales.name: Shine On: Metallic Accents
sales.description: Nothing makes a room pop like a little shine. To that end, these metallic accessories — vases, candle stands, bowls, trays, mirrors, and more — will glam up your interior design. Don’t be afraid to mix golden and silvery hues (in fact, we encourage it).

sales.name: Harden Furniture
sales.description: Crafted in the U.S. for over 160 years, this hardwood furniture has a homespun feel but fits well with traditional or contemporary design schemes. Choose from beds, chairs, ottomans, armoires, and tables in a variety of sizes. Pull the look together with neutral-toned, bold-printed rugs from top names like Surya and Odegard.

sales.name: Harden Furniture
sales.description: Crafted in the U.S. for over 160 years, this hardwood furniture has a homespun feel but fits well with traditional or contemporary design schemes. Choose from beds, chairs, ottomans, armoires, and tables in a variety of sizes. Pull the look together with neutral-toned, bold-printed rugs from top names like Surya and Odegard.

sales.name: Top Gear: Inglesina, Perry Mackin & More
A Pea in the Pod: Maternity Apparel
sales.description: We're so excited to offer you these bump-friendly styles from Pea in the Pod! Stay comfortable and stylish with solid and patterned tops, plus flattering skirts, pants, and dresses, all for up to 50 percent off.

sales.name: The Perfect Pair: Earrings We Love
sales.description: A great pair of earrings is all you need to make an otherwise ordinary look the talk of the night — and that's the inspiration behind this sale, which features an array some of our most covetable styles. Whether you prefer elegant chandelier earrings or showstopping teardrop styles in a rainbow of hues, it's all in the mix. Enjoy!

sales.name: The Last of Their Kinds: Accessories
sales.description: Spring weather calls for accessories that are as cheerful as the season. And this lot features an array of colorful laptop bags and canvas totes, handbags crafted from luxe exotic skins, and much more. Spot a piece that has your name on it? Snag it before it's too late — each item in this assortment is the last of its kind.

sales.name: Sunday Night Steals
sales.description: It’s Sunday night. The weekend is nearly over. But don’t despair — we’ve got a selection of top-notch gear to bring a little bit of extra joy to your evening. Scoop up a steal now and start your week off right.

sales.name: Top Gear: Inglesina, Perry Mackin & More
Always in Style: Black & White
sales.description: A black and white ensemble is the undisputed style chameleon. It's an ultimate basic and a beloved classic and yet, if done right, it also adds drama and elegance to your wardrobe. The spring separates here — flutter dresses, shells, lightweight blazers, tanks — are crisp, clean, and evocative of summer in the city. Wear them on their own, or add a pop of color to be perfectly on-trend all season long.

sales.name: A Pea in the Pod: Maternity Apparel
sales.description: We're so excited to offer you these bump-friendly styles from Pea in the Pod! Stay comfortable and stylish with solid and patterned tops, plus flattering skirts, pants, and dresses, all for up to 50 percent off.

sales.name: Sunday Night Steals
sales.description: It’s Sunday night. The weekend is nearly over. But don’t despair — we’ve got a selection of top-notch gear to bring a little bit of extra joy to your evening. Scoop up a steal now and start your week off right.

sales.name: Sunday Night Steals: Apparel & Accessories
sales.description: Want to score of-the-moment styles by some of your favorite designer names for less? This mix of essential separates, dresses, and accessories from some of your favorite designers will make dressing for the new season simple.

sales.name: Tom Delavan Shops the Warehouse
sales.description: Gilt Home’s creative director, Tom Delavan, took a walk through our inventory, and this is the result: a curated selection of furnishings and accents with clean, graceful lines and a relaxed, unpretentious aesthetic. “Each piece plays well with others,” says Delavan, noting that all of his picks — from a dove-gray hand-knotted rug to a sleek hurricane lamp — will fit equally well in modern and traditional spaces. “These are pieces you won’t tire of,” notes Delavan, "yet many are so simple, they’re often overlooked.” Take Billy Cotton’s wine glasses and Matahari’s woven nesting baskets, which he loves for their blend of style and function: “They’re elegant takes on everyday essentials.”

sales.name: Drink more red blends! 94 point Napa Valley Ritual Red
One-of-a-Kind Rugs
sales.description: From country manor to modern bedroom, these beautiful, handmade rugs will appear perfectly at home. Whether you prefer a traditional motif, a colorful patchwork print, or a stripe-y kilim, you can rest assured that your choice will stand the test of time.

sales.name: Wardrobe Essentials: Everything You Need
sales.description: Meet the components of classic, versatile style: the perfect skirt, the everyday dress, the shell, the bright jewel, the T-strap, and the day bag.

sales.name: I Love Lamp
sales.description: "I love lamp, I love lamp," mutters Brick Tamland in one of our fave movies, Anchorman: The Legend of Ron Burgundy. Channel his enthusiasm with these picks from Gilt Home’s lighting selection. From extroverted to classical to sleek-modern, these table lamps do more than light a room — they’ll also illuminate your design outlook.

sales.name: Three Little Trees
sales.description: Two Australian mums started Three Little Trees in 2007, and according to their adorable website, they make "really awesome clothes for really awesome kids." We couldn't agree more! The standout selection here contains a unique mix of dresses, denim skirts and vests, graphic tops, and more.

sales.name: Gilt Exclusive: LAX Dark by MASHstudios
sales.description: Inspired design that fits seamlessly into your home, no matter what your style: That’s the raison d’etre behind the LAX line by the L.A.–based multidisciplinary design studio MASHstudios. The LAX Dark series features stylish, multifunctional pieces (like a mobile night table that doubles as storage for files), all done in dark woods that lend a feeling of warmth to a room.

sales.name: The Basics Shop: Feat. Dockers
sales.description: When it comes to building a great wardrobe, start with the basics. We've got a selection of go-to pieces here — from underwear and socks to shirts and dress shoes — that’ll set you on the road to a properly outfitted closet.

sales.name: Fine Jewelry Personal Shopping
sales.description:
Our Fine Jewelry Personal Shopping team is now available to offer one-on-one assistance in finding everything from classic investment pieces to one-of-a-kind designs not currently available on Gilt.com. To give you some idea of the kinds of gorgeous gems to which we have access, we’ve rounded up an amazing array of finds for your perusing pleasure, including multi-gem earrings, museum-worthy necklaces, and diamonds galore.

Looking for something you don’t see here? Contact our Personal Jewelry Shopping team at jewelryrequests@gilt.com or (855) 758-3765.
